document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2000-07
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 10.36 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE PERTAINING TO THE TIME LIMITS FOR ABATING ABANDONED, WRECKED, DISMANTLED, OR INOPERATIVE VEHICLES FROM 90 DAYS TO 30 DAYS
